data.title: Neue Staatsgalerie und Kammertheater Stuttgart - James Stirling / Michael Wilford fonds
data.text:
Neue Staatsgalerie und Kammertheater Stuttgart

Neue Staatsgalerie und Kammertheater Stuttgart

Part of

Fonds: James Stirling / Michael Wilford fonds, circa 1939-2004

Series: James Stirling/Michael Wilford professional papers, [ca. 1948-2004?]

Sub-series: Publications, lectures and writings, circa 1961-2001

Sub-series: Neue Staatsgalerie und Kammertheater Stuttgart, circa 1984

People

James Stirling, Michael Wilford, and Associates (creator)

Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg (Germany). Finanzministerium (publisher)

James Frazer Stirling (archive creator)

Title

Neue Staatsgalerie und Kammertheater Stuttgart

Dates of creation

circa 1984

Level of archival description

File 5

Extent and Medium

approximately 100 reprograhic copies

Scope and Content

File documents the publication of the book 'Neue Staatsgalerie und Kammertheater Stuttgart'. Material in this file was produced before 1984.

File contains negatives.

Reference Number

AP140.S2.SS4.D5

Arrangement

Material in this sub-series was likely kept in its original order when it was first processed upon its arrival at CCA.

Location

Stuttgart Germany

Language of material

Documents are in English.

Related units of description

File AP140.S2.SS4.D5 also includes information on file AP140.S2.SS1.D52.
